{{also|預約|豫約}}
==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|よ|やく|yomi=on}}

===Pronunciation===
* {{ja-pron|よやく|y=o|acc=0|acc_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|よやく|kyu=豫約}}

# [[reservation]], [[booking]]
# [[appointment]]; an arrangement for a meeting
# [[subscription]]

===Verb===
{{ja-verb-suru|よやく}}

# [[reserve]]
# [[make]] an appointment
# [[subscribe]]

====Conjugation====
{{ja-suru|よやく}}

====Usage notes====
In the sense “appointment”, 予約 is primarily used to mean “the arrangement, scheduling”; for an appointed meeting itself, {{m|ja|約束}} is used instead.

* {{l|ja|約束}}
* {{l|ja|ランデブー}}
